name: GetCollaborationWhitelistExemptUsers
description:
Retrieve users exempt from collaboration restrictions.

Use this tool to obtain a list of users who are not restricted by collaboration domain rules. It provides a quick way to identify exempt users.

parameters.name: pagination_position_marker
parameters.description: Start position for returning results. Used for marker-based pagination. Requires `usemarker` set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of users to return per page. Controls pagination size.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker

Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.
